title: Export settings
intro: Here you can configure settings for HTML and PDF exports, settings are automatically saved as they are updated.
settings_file_info: Your settings file is located at ~/.mkeditor/settings.json.
export_with_styles_help: Enable this to export with Bootstrap, FontAwesome and KaTeX styles, provided from official CDNs with secure integrity and crossorigin checks.
set_container_help: Set the container width class, fluid is larger width.
set_font_size_help: Set the font size in px.
